name: saasonrails
tagline: Software as a Service built on Ruby On Rails
body: ## saasonrails ### Build your app, not billing code. #### Build Fast Speed up Development and Deployment. Avoid writing subscription management, recurring billing, and credit card management code for your next Ruby On Rails project. #### Stripe Payments Integration SaaSonRails gets your new software-as-a-service site off to a running start by providing you a well-tested and proven recurring billing system with Stripe payments integration. #### And more ... You also get a framework for building membership-based applications, including basecamp-like subdmomains, account signups/upgrades/downgrades, tiered pricing levels with customizable limits, multi-tenant data security in a single database.
